contentList.content: Your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag> no longer prevents you from casting spells.
You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

You regain one use of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Rage">Rage</LSTag> after a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> and all uses after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You now regain all your uses of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Rage">Rage</LSTag> after a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
